GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object with the matching username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles unless a limit and page (p) are specified

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article and returns the newly created article object

exampleInput.title: Student SUES Mitch!
exampleInput.author: rogersop
exampleInput.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article with the corresponding id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments that reference the given article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the comments table and serves the newly created comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the vote property of the article with the matching id by the provided amount and serves the updated article

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments the vote property of the comment with the matching id by the provided amount and serves the updated comment

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the matching id and responds with no content
